Sequence Information.Peptide Name: ccBD (channel catfish beta defensin, natural AMPs; fish, animals, UCSS1a)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 76.7% similarity toNile tilapia beta-defensin.Activity: Active against Gram- E. coli, E. ictaluri, Y. ruckeri, A. hydrophila, A. veronii, Gram+ S. aureus, S. iniae, and S. agalactiae (MIC 12.5-25 ug/ml). Activity was also demonstrated by inhibition zone measurements (8.6-19.2 mm).
Literature Information.Author: Zhu J, Wang H, Wang J, Wang X, Peng S, Geng Y, Wang K, Ouyang P, Li Z, Huang X, Chen D.2017
Literature Information.Title: Identification and characterization of a beta-defensin gene involved in the immune defense response of channel catfish, Ictalurus punctatus
